pollutants.title: Major Air
pollutants.description: When the cinema halls and theatres are packed, there is no movement in the pollution particles, and as a result, they build up within the enclosed spaces. As a result, movie-goers will feel uneasy and unwell. This will reduce the number of their visits. In short, cinema halls will lose money.

pm25.title: PM2.5
pm25.description: Fine dust particles & water droplets suspended in the air (diameter of 2.5 microns)

co2.title: CO2
co2.description: CO2 levels exceed the desired CO2 limits at times when there is no movement in the air
co2.imgAlt: co2 gas in schools and institutes

tvoc.title: TVOC
tvoc.description: The fabric used in seating furniture or wooden products paints carpets

hcho.title: HCHO
hcho.description: Aerosol sprays perfumes and room fresheners are some of the potential sources

pm25.title: PM2.5
pm25.description: Carpet and clothing fibers, degradation of buildings

risk.title: Who are at
risk.description: Different people from different age groups can be present in a cinema hall. But certain groups are significantly impacted as compared to healthy adults.

respiratoryIllness.title: Respiratory Illness
respiratoryIllness.description: Movie-goers and staff with respiratory or other illnesses already have a weaker respiratory and immune system.

children.title: Children
children.description: Children have developing organs. When exposed the growing tissue and cell growth are hampered.

staff.title: Staff
staff.description: Lower productivity, absenteeism, and lower concentration are some of the side effects of exposure.
staff.imgAlt: Front desk staff in fitness center & gym

movieGoers.title: Movie-Goers
movieGoers.description: Healthy adults will experience side effects like headaches dizziness stuffiness and nausea.

solutions.title: Air quality
solutions.description: Prana Air air quality monitoring and purifying solutions give you the power to know what your customers and staff breathe and what you could do to clean the air to make your fitness centers and gyms 'Air pollution-free zone' and view and analyze your IAQ.

effects.title: The Effects of Air Pollution - In
effects.description: When movie-goers are exposed to poor air quality, they feel unwell, and headaches and nausea are common symptoms of air pollution exposure.

benefits.item2: Improve the health of the movie-goers
benefits.item3: Increase the comfort of the audience

q1.question: 1. What are the major pollutants that are present in a cinema hall?
q1.answer: Many pollutants can be present inside a typical cinema hall setting. CO2, TVOC, and dust particles are the main pollutants followed by noise, CO, airborne pathogens, temperature, etc.

q2.question: 2. What are the health impacts of the pollutants present inside the cinema hall?
q2.answer: Physical discomforts like headaches, nausea, dizziness, etc. among movie-goers and staff.

q3.question: 3. What are some criteria that need to be kept in mind for a comfortable movie experience?
q3.answer: Ventilation rate, noise, comfort level, mold score, organic aerosols, etc. are some of the criteria.

q4.question: 4. Why is it necessary to have air quality monitoring solutions?
q4.answer: To know the nature of pollutants and by how much are they present in a cinema hall so that necessary actions can be taken.

q5.question: 5. How can I check the AQI of my cinema hall using your device?
q5.answer: Prana Air Monitors are WiFi enabled so you don't need to set up a wire framework to extract and display the data. Simply connect the monitor to the dashboard through WiFi connectivity and view the real-time data on your screens.

q6.question: 6. Are any other parameters included in the monitors other than the air pollutants?
q6.answer: Yes, you can monitor the temperature, noise, and humidity in an area.

q7.question: 7. Are there any additional benefits that come with the solutions?
q7.answer: Customizable dashboard, 24*7 remote access to the data, get health tips, real-time and historical data analysis, QR code to scan and know the real-time AQI of that area, and many more.
